comments.body: Are we planning to use the HTML reports? At least initially I would focus on emitting regular diagnostics that we can show in the IDE instead of producing a separate report.
No, no intent to use HTML reports. I think this is another template the library uses to generate `report.html` files from.

diffHunk:
